com.safenetinc.luna.provider

Class LunaRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.SecureRandomSpi
      • com.safenetinc.luna.provider.LunaRandom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LunaRandom
extends java.security.SecureRandomSpi
    The LunaProvider SecureRandom engine class. Random numbers provided by this engine are generated in the Luna HSM. If the engine is initialized without a seed, self-seeding is done in hardware.

    The user must be logged in to an HSM. The RNG operations will occur on the default slot as returned by LunaSlotManager.getDefaultSlot().

    See Also:
